page.title: 06Education
page.content: My name is John.On Friday I got up when the alarm went at 8.00 a.m. I washed and dressed and had cornflakes for my breakfast before going to school at 8.45 a.m. I helped to get out the school computer. It has to be locked away each night in case we are burgled again. Each class takes the computer in turn. Our favourite program is {"Dare Devil Devil Denis"}and the younger children like{"Trucks"}and {"Cat and Mouse".}We have lots of spelling games too. I helped to put out the chairs for the infant Assembly.Our parents were invited to join the children in their assembly about{Noah and the Ark. Some of us have started our own anti-litter campaign called{K.A.T.S.Y. Keep a Tidy School Yard. We forget sometimes and have to be reminded.
